Schulenburg. Second run an hour away. Just traded friendly trash talk with the Austin Police Run Team. Eating our way across TX. BBQ here.
Team RunTexians lost 3 minutes to the train crossing. Where do we file the protest? j/k All part of the fun.
Just left Flatonia. Warm welcome from their Chamber. Loved the "run Rick run" sign at the Lyric Theater. Took quick tour of Olle Hotel.
Jen Ohlson just finished her run. Real speedster. Stopped at Dairy Treat in Moulton. Feeling good about Team RunTexians.
Just mixed up some Pure Sport recovery drink for Bernard, our team's world class runner. In awe of his speed and endurance. Headed to Shiner
Just recorded a quick video for next week on our obesity initiative out here at the second exchange point.
Just finished up 6 miles from Gonzales, the Lexington of TX. Wind was a kick in the teeth. Real thrill to fire the Come And Take It cannon.

Heading over to Erwin Center to catch Class A girls bball final. If you're in Austin this weekend, stop by for the best bball in the USA.
